Blackfang: Well, Cam and I were training when we found you. How about
we resume that, but with another trainer?

He glanced at Cam, knowing the child would be happy to be trained by
KitKat and him. Had he had a mouth, he would have smiled, but already,
his eyes told he was happy about the situation.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> She smiled at him. She was kind of glad that he didn't want her to 
> leave. Still standing close to him, 
> "Alright then. I'll stay for a little while."
> She opened her comlink to SharpClaw. He was the only one whom she 
> felt would care about her whereabouts.
> "SharpClaw. This is KitKat. I shall be here for a little while. If 
> Hydras wonders where I am, tell him that I am...ah...running an 
> errand."  
> She closed her commlink and looked at Blackfang. Something wasn't 
> right about this situation. What bothered her the most was that she 
> actually felt herself wanting to stay here with this wolfbot. 
> Something about him tugged at her spark.  She actually found herself 
> in a slight struggle between her spark and her programming.  
> "Well, what would you like to do first?"
> 
> 
> 
> - In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang: No! Don't go! (He realized he was a little rude) I 
> mean...
> > We're happy to welcome you here...
> >
